特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法:
This class will be conducted in English only, and students are expected to use English exclusively while participating.
This course meets three times per week, and we will be exploring and researching current issues that have a great impact on our world. Some classes will be basically a seminar and pair-work format; other days will focus on presentation and discussion skills; One day a week will generally be devoted to writing and some research. Some limited lecture time will occur throughout the course. Active student interaction and participation is a strong expectation of this course. Currently, the intention is for this class to be taught face-to-face; adaptations may be made in light of changing conditions and university policies. Students are expected to follow safety protocols (i.e. wearing masks and respecting social distancing) during all face-to-face classes.

第33回: Class sessions listed above are subject to change in accordance with student needs and any changes to the university calendar.

The purpose of this course is for students to develop their English language knowledge (vocabulary, grammar, and discourse) and language skills (listening, speaking, reading, and writing) within an all-English communicative environment to enable them to meet the academic requirements of study abroad programs.
トピック.授業計画1: Class sessions listed above are subject to change in accordance with student needs and any changes to the university calendar.

成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.
成績評価Grading1: Homework, Activities and Tasks: 30%; Participation: 30%, Major Presentation: 20%; Major Essay: 20%
